name: CGDataProvider
desc: An abstraction for data-reading tasks that eliminates the need to manage a raw memory buffer.

items.name: struct CGDataProviderSequentialCallbacks
items.desc: Defines a structure containing pointers to client-defined callback functions that manage the sending of data for a sequential-access data provider.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderRewindCallback
items.desc: A callback function that moves the current position in the data stream back to the beginning.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderGetBytesCallback
items.desc: A callback function that copies from a provider data stream into a Core Graphics buffer.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderSkipForwardCallback
items.desc: A callback function that advances the current position in the data stream supplied by the provider.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderReleaseInfoCallback
items.desc: A callback function that releases any private data or resources associated with the data provider.

items.name: init?(data: CFData)
items.desc: Creates a data provider that reads from a CFData object.

items.name: init?(url: CFURL)
items.desc: Creates a direct-access data provider that uses a URL to supply data.

items.name: init?(dataInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, data: UnsafeRawPointer, size: Int, releaseData: CGDataProviderReleaseDataCallback)
items.desc: Creates a direct-access data provider that uses data your program supplies.

items.name: init?(filename: UnsafePointer<CChar>)
items.desc: Creates a direct-access data provider that uses a file to supply data.

items.name: struct CGDataProviderDirectCallbacks
items.desc: Defines pointers to client-defined callback functions that manage the sending of data for a direct-access data provider.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderGetBytePointerCallback
items.desc: A callback function that returns a generic pointer to the provider data.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderGetBytesAtPositionCallback
items.desc: A callback function that copies data from the provider into a Core Graphics buffer.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderReleaseBytePointerCallback
items.desc: A callback function that releases the pointer Core Graphics obtained by calling CGDataProviderGetBytePointerCallback.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderReleaseInfoCallback
items.desc: A callback function that releases any private data or resources associated with the data provider.

items.name: typealias CGDataProviderReleaseDataCallback
items.desc: A callback function that releases data you supply to the function init(dataInfo:data:size:releaseData:).

items.name: var data: CFData?
items.desc: Returns a copy of the providerâ€™s data.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for data providers.
